themeDescription: Integration of physical presence and digital immersion in 2026 spatial computing, fostering embodied intelligence where virtual spaces enhance human cognition, empathy, and recursive self-perception.

newNodes.label: Immersive Presence
newNodes.description: Core of spatial computing: blending real and virtual to create felt embodiment. For consciousness: cultivates deeper sensory awareness, turning abstract ideas into tangible experiences for growth.

newNodes.label: Haptic Interaction Loops
newNodes.description: Recursive feedback via gestures, haptics, and spatial audio in AR/VR. Mirrors personal development: actions in immersive spaces reinforce neural pathways, accelerating skill acquisition through embodied practice.

newNodes.label: Extended Spatial Cognition
newNodes.description: Mind expands into digital space, offloading memory and visualization to environments. Growth parallel: uses spatial metaphors for abstract concepts, enabling fractal-like unpacking of complex ideas in consciousness.

newNodes.label: Embodied Empathy Simulation
newNodes.description: Inhabit others' perspectives through shared spatial experiences or avatars. Consciousness insight: breaks ego boundaries, promoting collective awareness and recursive understanding of interconnected selves.

newNodes.label: Transcendent Spatial Self
newNodes.description: At depth, dissolve body-digital divide for fluid, multi-dimensional identity. Personal evolution: recursive loops of embodiment lead to non-dual states, where spatial computing catalyzes absolute unity consciousness.

progressionNote: Suggested entry layer: 4 (builds on 3D sacred geometry; requires temporal/4D clearance for full immersion). Max depth potential: 8–9 for exploring infinite spatial fractals and collective embodiment.
